about_the_game:
The Plague Doctor

The Plague Doctor brings devastating fatigue to enemies with his handcrafted flasks of poison and disease. This mysterious vigilante wields an array of lethal tools, from sharp surgical knives to summoning a giant, malformed rat to unleash chaos on anyone in his path.

Playstyle:

The Plague Doctor offers players fast-paced, mid-range combat, utilizing a diverse set of tools to amplify damage output at crucial moments while maintaining a high pool of hit points for riskier engagements. Players who choose this class will enjoy its vitality, consistent damage output, and the thrill of wearing down enemies with relentless poison.

Recommended for:

  • Players who enjoy fast-paced, mid-range combat with a focus on poison mechanics.

  • Those who like stacking health to enable risk-taking.

  • If you just want to watch the world cough to death...

Make sure they suffer before perishing!
